issues.description: The problem statement refers to a function named `fix_dot_product`, but the template and solution define and use `fix_vec_dot_asm` for the same dot-product operation. This mismatch prevents students from locating the intended function and mapping the problem requirement to the provided code.
issues.suggested_fix: Unify the identifier across all artifacts. For example, update the problem statement to refer to `fix_vec_dot_asm` instead of `fix_dot_product`, or rename `fix_vec_dot_asm` in the template and solution to `fix_dot_product`.
